mapper.select: SELECT BOARDSEQ , USERID , TITLE , CONTENT , REGDATE FROM (SELECT BOARDSEQ , USERID , TITLE , CONTENT , REGDATE , ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY BOARDSEQ DESC)RN FROM BOARD a WHERE DELFLAG = 'N') WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT USERID,BOARDSEQ, REPLYSEQ, CONTENT , REGDATE FROM (SELECT BOARDSEQ , USERID ,REPLYSEQ, CONTENT , REGDATE, ROW_NUMBER () OVER(ORDER BY BOARDSEQ DESC)RN FROM REPLY_BOARD a WHERE DELFLAG = 'N' AND BOARDSEQ =#{boardseq}) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY_BOARD rb WHERE BOARDSEQ =#{boardseq} AND DELFLAG = 'N'
